ingredients.ingredient: 4 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and sliced 1/2 inch thick

cookingTips: Slice sweet potatoes uniformly for even cooking throughout
Brush both sides with butter mixture to prevent drying
Cover with foil initially, then uncover toward end for caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Sweet potatoes need sufficient moisture to cook through. How can you balance texture and prevent drying?
